body_html:
The website (https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=ubuntu&configuration=compile#install-with-gpu-support) requires the following versions:

If you plan to use GPU instead of CPU only, then you should install NVIDIA CUDA 8 and cuDNN v5.1 or v6.0

Perhaps you should install and use the NVIDIA CUDA 8 and the cuDNN v5.1 or v6.0.
I have just installed the CPU-Only version.

body:
The website (https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=ubuntu&configuration=compile#install-with-gpu-support)  requires the following versions:

> If you plan to use GPU instead of CPU only, then you should install NVIDIA CUDA 8 and cuDNN v5.1 or v6.0

Perhaps you should install and use the NVIDIA CUDA 8 and the cuDNN v5.1 or v6.0.
I have just installed the CPU-Only version.
